messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: TV on while doing other things
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/4/2005 10:25:15 PM Eastern Standard Time, ccoutlaw@direcway.com writes: In our  house there is always something on, TV or stereo. My dh
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/2005 10:25:15 PM Eastern Standard Time,
ccoutlaw@... writes:

In our house there is always something on, TV or stereo. My dh says we drive
him crazy, working on the computer & having a show on at the same time :)
or cleaning up & having the TV on.
I think I get more done with it on, it takes my mind off what I'm doing
(like cleaning) and the task seems to go faster.
But I can't stand talking on the phone while the TV is on.

Carol



~~~~~~~~~~
lol, same exact way here... something is on, whether it be the TV or stereo.
I just made a request to DH that I'd like a little kitchen radio, one that
can play a CD. I just need something to occupy me while I do dishes or
something.

Jenny
Unschooling in Greenfield, MA
Danny (12-1-99), Kelsey (11-1-01) and Evelyn (5-19-04)
~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
The important thing is not so much that every child should be taught, as
that every child should be given the wish to learn. ~John Lubbock



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: TV on while doing other things
messages.msgSnippet: In our house there is always something on, TV or stereo. My dh says we drive him crazy, working on the computer & having a show on at the same time :) or
messages.messageBody:
In our house there is always something on, TV or stereo. My dh says we drive
him crazy, working on the computer & having a show on at the same time :)
or cleaning up & having the TV on.
I think I get more done with it on, it takes my mind off what I'm doing
(like cleaning) and the task seems to go faster.
But I can't stand talking on the phone while the TV is on.

Carol
****************


" I'm another 1 of those who has to have background TV noise. I
sometimes wonder if it gets in the way of what we're doing though.
Does anyone else have any feelings about this?"
